tasks.name: Math Quiz
tasks.describe: A set of 10 multiple-choice math questions covering various topics such as algebra, geometry, and arithmetic.

tasks.name: Word Scramble
tasks.describe: Unscramble 10 words to reveal common English vocabulary. Great for improving language skills and vocabulary.

tasks.name: Trivia Challenge
tasks.describe: Test your knowledge with 10 trivia questions from diverse categories like history, science, entertainment, and sports.

tasks.name: Code Puzzle
tasks.describe: Solve 10 coding challenges to exercise your programming skills. Suitable for beginners and intermediate coders.

tasks.name: Grammar Check
tasks.describe: Identify and correct grammar mistakes in 10 sentences. Helpful for improving writing skills and language proficiency.

tasks.name: Geography Quiz
tasks.describe: Answer 10 geography questions about countries, capitals, landmarks, and geographical features around the world.

tasks.name: Logic Riddles
tasks.describe: Solve 10 logic riddles that challenge your critical thinking and problem-solving abilities.

tasks.name: Science Experiment
tasks.describe: Perform 10 simple science experiments at home to explore basic scientific principles and phenomena.

tasks.name: Art History Quiz
tasks.describe: Test your knowledge of art history with 10 questions about famous artists, movements, and masterpieces.

tasks.name: Memory Game
tasks.describe: Exercise your memory with a classic memory game featuring 10 pairs of images or words to match.
